page.title: 17Strensall Camp - Facilities
page.content: {Depot, The King's Division}is based at Strensall. It trains new adult recruits and Territorial Army personnel. Facilities include 2 Football pitches, 1 Rugby pitch, 1 grass Hockey pitch, a Gymnasium and an Assault Course. The {families}of the soldiers have access to these facilities and some village football teams are allowed to practise there. The{children}living in the married quarters next to the camp use the playing fields, the common (when the{red warning flag}is not flying) and the play parks. There is a NAAFI shop for general purchases. The different ranks have their own messes. Most of the houses are quite new and some were only completed in 1984. A few families live in private houses, sometimes owned by the M.O.D. The children attend Strensall school.
